body_html:
Hi ! Sorry the delay.
A comment in the docs would be helpful.
I understand your point, but I think that if we want Tensorflow to be multiplatform it would be nice to have one behaviour for all, because if you have a team where half are using one platform and half the other, they won't be able to work with the same code, or they would have to add a conditional based on the platform.
body_text:
Hi ! Sorry the delay.
A comment in the docs would be helpful.
I understand your point, but I think that if we want Tensorflow to be multiplatform it would be nice to have one behaviour for all, because if you have a team where half are using one platform and half the other, they won't be able to work with the same code, or they would have to add a conditional based on the platform.
body:
Hi ! Sorry the delay.
A comment in the docs would be helpful.
I understand your point, but I think that if we want Tensorflow to be multiplatform it would be nice to have one behaviour for all, because if you have a team where half are using one platform and half the other, they won't be able to work with the same code, or they would have to add a conditional based on the platform.
